For now i got the following workaround, using an exec task (tailored only to RH8.0):

    <echo>Check the rpm log file at '${rpm}/rpmbuild.log' for rpm generation
details</echo>
    <exec executable="rpmbuild" os="Linux" failonerror="true"
output="${rpm}/rpmbuild.log">
    	<arg line="-bb" />
	<arg line="--rmspec"/>
	<arg line="--rmsource"/>
	<arg line="${rpm}/SPECS/${specfile}"/>
    </exec>


Hope this helps.

JV.

text:
This appears to be due to the fact that the b option, and all those assocated
with it (--rebuild et al) have been moved to the rpmbuild application in version
4.1 of rpm
